Name: M-1
Title: Unveiling the Golden Veil
Explain: Hidden in the darkness before Dawn, Gray Raven traveled through sandstorms and entered the unpopulated desert named "Golden Vortex".

Name: M-2
Title: First Conflict
Explain: After parting ways with Liv, Gray Raven and the guards of Golden Vortex had conflict for the first time.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-3
Title: Mystery of the Light Pillar
Explain: In the center of Golden Vortex was a group of buildings shrouded in the "Golden Pillar". Its origin was still unknown to Gray Raven.

Name: M-4
Title: Mystery of the Light Pillar
Explain: 30 minutes after Liv left, Lucia found the remains of Goldfinch members. She swore that she would find out the murderer.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B II-1
Title: Value of Existence
Explain: Yesterday at noon time, Goldfinch changed their mission objective and started heading toward the center of Golden Vortex.

Name: B II-2
Title: Stumble
Explain: It took Goldfinch almost three hours before they finally arrived at the outer walls of the central area...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B II-3
Title: A Bridge Too Far
Explain: Goldfinch members were attacked and chased by the guards. By evening, they realized they no longer had the strength to move any further... <color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B II-4
Title: Contribution
Explain: As the night started to fall, Goldfinch members seemed to have foreseen their upcoming fate...

Name: M-5
Title: Lone Raven
Explain: After the communication with Liv was cut, Lee left to search for her. Lucia stayed back with the commandant.

Name: M-6
Title: Secret Passage
Explain: It had been an hour in Golden Vortex, and only Lucia and the commandant were left. They were forced to fall back to the underground secret passage.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-7
Title: The Queen and Hope
Explain: After hiding underground for 15 minutes... A Construct caught Lucia's attention. It was walking without purpose like a corpse.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-8
Title: Royal Guards
Explain: The queen's royal guards chased after Lucia and the commandant. They had to run for almost an hour...

Name: B III-1
Title: Red Light, Green Light
Explain: Minutes after Lee left, he was trapped among a group of guards with peculiar behaviors...

Name: B III-2
Title: Battle in Alley
Explain: Lee struggled for half an hour trying to get rid of the guards. He moved to the secret passage, hoping the guards would be lost...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 2</color>

Name: B III-3
Title: Big Gamble
Explain: Lee fought a tough battle in the underground secret passage. The guards wanted to trap him to death...

Name: M-9
Title: Letter of Invitation
Explain: When Lucia was trapped in a tough fight, the mysterious queen sent her royal guards to invite the commandant to her palace.

Name: M-10
Title: Awakening
Explain: The invitation was in fact a subjugation. Lucia turned down the Queen's offer, so Gray Raven and the royal guards went to war.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 2</color>

Name: M-11
Title: Queen's Arrival
Explain: It was nearly noon, the sun was hanging high in the sky and scorching the Golden Vortex. The "Golden Queen" finally revealed herself...

Name: B I-1
Title: Companion
Explain: Liv joined Browning, the leader of Goldfinch. They started searching for the tactical devices left behind by Goldfinch in the desert.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B I-2
Title: Digging Site
Explain: Browning finally found the device after searching in the desert for almost 40 minutes. But it was covered under some golden powder...

Name: B I-3
Title: Protection
Explain: The device seemed to have attracted lots of guards. As they quickly came close, Liv swore to protect Browning...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B I-4
Title: Aftermath
Explain: After more than 10 minutes of digging, the device was almost out. But Browning triggered a landmine underneath it...

Name: B I-5
Title: Trojan Horse
Explain: To ensure the search mission could succeed, Liv decided to hack into the device's operating system...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 3000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B I-6
Title: Cheap Shot
Explain: Liv returned to her Construct after 5 minutes of hacking into the system. But Browning...

Name: B I-7
Title: Explosive Encounter
Explain: Liv seized the opportunity for a "mutual destruction" with Browning...

Name: M I-1
Title: Maverick
Explain: Watanabe reached the Golden Vortex in the morning. The enemy info was still unknown, but he charged in alone.

Name: M I-2
Title: Inquisition
Explain: Watanabe spent a few minutes observing the guards. He decided to capture one for inquisition.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M I-3
Title: Risk Transfer
Explain: 10 minutes into the Golden Vortex, Watanabe met Bianca and decided to follow her.

Name: M II-1
Title: Saving the Earth
Explain: After sending Liv away, Bianca searched in the sand for half an hour because she had figured out Babylonia's real intention...

Name: M II-2
Title: Back Alive
Explain: Bianca found survivors of Goldfinch unexpectedly while collecting samples... They were still alive!<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M I-4
Title: Old Habit
Explain: It didn't take long before Watanabe was forced to reveal himself...

Name: M I-5
Title: Clash
Explain: The negotiation didn't last long before Watanabe and Bianca escalated it into a violent event.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M I-6
Title: Choice
Explain: Watanabe's rescue plan faced challenge immediately after he got away from Bianca...

Name: M I-7
Title: Culprit of Sandstorm
Explain: Less than 1 hour into the Golden Vortex, Watanabe found the weather engine responsible for the sandstorm...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M I-8
Title: Relic
Explain: After leaving the weather engine, Watanabe found a pendant of the Forsaken from a guard...

Name: M II-3
Title: Queen's Treat
Explain: Golden Queen revealed her true form to Gray Raven. Meanwhile, Bianca had explored Golden Vortex for hours, but the sample analysis still hadn't succeeded...

Name: M II-4
Title: Tick-Tock
Explain: While waiting for the results of sample analysis, Bianca heard some strange noise. She followed the sound but ended up in a group of "Silent Guards"...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M I-12
Title: Queen's Request
Explain: Golden Queen announced her requests to the commandant and Babylonia in her palace.

Name: M I-9
Title: Destiny
Explain: Watanabe met Bianca again, but refused to abandon any Forsaken. Violence became the last resort once again...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 2</color>

Name: M I-10
Title: Promise
Explain: Watanabe and Bianca fought for almost 10 minutes, but neither was going to win. The guards took the opportunity and laid siege on them...

Name: B-1
Title: Off Form
Explain: Kamui and Roland fought all the way to the northwest of Golden Vortex, when Kamui discovered some anomaly in Roland's Construct...

Name: B-2
Title: Invincible
Explain: Kamui'd been fighting the Corrupted for almost half an hour. Roland managed to escape into the building... But Kamui wouldn't let him go!<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M I-11
Title: Promise Keeper
Explain: It took Watanabe an hour to make sure all Forsaken had safely evacuated. Some tried to persuade him not to return and help Bianca...

Name: M II-5
Title: Hostage
Explain: After defeating the "Silent Guards", Bianca followed the strange noise into a secret chamber with humans locked up in it...

Name: M II-6
Title: Unexpected Assistance
Explain: Bianca considered the pros and cons for a brief moment, then decided to rescue the hostage.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M II-7
Title: Two Ways of Rescue
Explain: Bianca defeated the warden and freed all the hostage. Bianca stopped her as he wanted to take his own men.

Name: M II-8
Title: Golden Antibody
Explain: Despite letting the hostage go, Bianca still took the Golden Antibody... But the royal guards suddenly attacked her!

Name: M II-9
Title: Fatal Combo
Explain: At noon, Watanabe brought Forsaken to help Bianca... But the Queen's royal guards were pouring bullets!<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 4000             Required units: 2</color>

Name: B-3
Title: Negotiation
Explain: After confronting each other for many more minutes, Kamui almost made Roland devastated...

Name: M I-13
Title: For Commandant
Explain: Bianca fought alongside the Forsaken to defeat the royal guards. Once again, she faced different choices...

Name: M I-1
Title: Follower
Explain: Karenina sneaked into the Golden Vortex from the south. But she didn't know she was followed...

Name: M l-2
Title: Shield of Protection
Explain: The guards had their eyes on Karenina the moment she stepped into the Golden Vortex.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M l-3
Title: Toolbox
Explain: After thirty minutes of high-speed marching, Karenina finally got to demonstrate her strength...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M l-4
Title: Human Experiment
Explain: Nanami joined Karenina to defeat the guards of the main building together, but she disappeared within 5 minutes...

Name: M l-5
Title: Restructure
Explain: Karenina received the analysis report of the antibody. She must re-establish the communication network to upload it...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M l-6
Title: Starting Again
Explain: The communication was restored for minutes and Karenina completed her mission with flying colors. It's up to her where she wants to go now.

Name: M l-7
Title: Resistance
Explain: Blasting through dozens of walls, Karenina decided to explore Golden Vortex in her own way...

Name: M l-8
Title: Builder's Puzzle
Explain: After the walls were destroyed, the route became straight forward. It only took them minutes to break into the forbidden area.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M l-9
Title: Merge
Explain: Nanami returned, but she brought bad news about Roland the Ascendant...

Name: M l-10
Title: Reverse Invasion
Explain: In order to find Roland's whereabouts, Nanami hacked into the guards' internal network. But Nithart saw it all...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M l-11
Title: Vision
Explain: Nanami's hacking only took a few minutes. She failed to trace Roland in the internal network, but she found out that Nithart took the commandant of Gray Raven...

Name: M l-12
Title: Hidden Entrance
Explain: With the construction blueprint at hand, they managed to arrive at the entrance to the Queen's palace within an hour.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M l-13
Title: Tracking the Sound
Explain: After defeating golden guards and royal guards, they were only one door away from the commandant...

Name: B ll-1
Title: Deterrence
Explain: Under Roland's order, the Corrupted managed to stall Kamui for over 2 hours, only to make him fight even harder...

Name: B ll-2
Title: Broken Sword
Explain: Kamui knew it very well: as long as the Elite Corrupted was defeated, he could go after Roland again.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 2</color>

Name: M ll-1
Title: Hospitality
Explain: After getting rid of Kamui, Roland carefully assessed the threat of Golden Antibody...

Name: M ll-2
Title: Imprisoned
Explain: Roland stepped into Nithart's trap. Thanks to the antibody, the power of Punishing Virus was rapidly reduced.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M ll-3
Title: Seeking Help
Explain: Captured by Nithart, Roland was unfortunately covered in the antibody and suffered for 90 minutes...

Name: B l-1
Title: Communication Disorder
Explain: After leaving Karenina, Nanami finally found the thing that caught her attention.

Name: B l-2
Title: Alarm of Misplacement
Explain: As Nanami triggered the alarm in the Corrupted zone, she became a must-kill target...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M ll-4
Title: Blockage
Explain: Roland spent an hour calling for help, but the reinforcement didn't arrive as expected.

Name: M ll-5
Title: Sealing
Explain: To Roland's surprise, Nanami broke into the trap and resolved his biggest trouble...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 2</color>

Name: M ll-6
Title: Mutual Destruction
Explain: Due to the antibody, Roland was completely overwhelmed by Nanami. He had to use more extreme methods to save himself.

Name: M ll-7
Title: Annihilation
Explain: As the building collapsed, Roland fell into the ruins. He had a chance to prove himself again...

Name: M ll-8
Title: Internal Trouble
Explain: Roland finally got his power back. He managed to go around Nithart's surveillance network and sneaked into the core power room of Golden Vortex...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 5000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-1
Title: Hound or Eagle
Explain: Soldiers of Babylonia gathered for the first time in the afternoon. The truth of Golden Antibody was soon announced...

Name: M-2
Title: The Queen's Fury
Explain: The Golden Queen was infuriated by the allegation. She decided to no longer care about the commandant's safety...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-3
Title: Traitor
Explain: One traitor, one key. The conflict between Golden Queen and Gray Raven intensified...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-4
Title: Unity
Explain: The queen's royal guards all appeared. Gray Raven's evacuation plan was interrupted once again.

Name: M-5
Title: Total Alert
Explain: An hour into the ambush against Gray Raven, Golden Queen once again destroyed the Constructs' formation...

Name: M-6
Title: Duet
Explain: Gray Raven used the secret passage to lose the royal guards, but they were also separated from Nanamiâ€¦<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-7
Title: Prelude of Pandemic
Explain: As the power system of Golden Vortex crashed, Babylonia's remote communication was restored. Gray Raven managed to contact Hassen...

Name: M-8
Title: Climb
Explain: 50 minutes into the evacuation, Gray Raven and other Constructs finally found the correct route.

Name: B ll-1
Title: Expansion
Explain: Minutes into the trap, Karenina discovered the secret to the expanding numbers of golden guards...

Name: B ll-2
Title: Puppet
Explain: To get back to the commandant, Karenina must break through the guards without consuming too much energy.<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B lll-1
Title: Tearing Metal
Explain: Golden Queen prepared special guards catering to the characteristics of Bianca's Construct...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B lll-2
Title: Scorching Hot
Explain: 7 minutes after Bianca defeated the guards, she encountered another out-of-control guard...

Name: M-9
Title: Gambit
Explain: Far away in the space, an emergency meeting was taking place in Babylonia's ship...

Name: M-10
Title: Two-Way Door
Explain: The evacuation would last approximately 2 hours. Karenina and Lee's cross-force collaboration would determine the fate of all Constructs...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-11
Title: Peak Extermination
Explain: The power system had collapsed for 90 minutes. Gray Raven and other Constructs arrived at the evacuation point, but Golden Queen followed them...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-12
Title: Dynasty
Explain: Gray Raven successfully held off the royal guards. Infuriated, Golden Queen exposed her biggest weakness...

Name: B l-1
Title: Master Gamer
Explain: Kamui was too powerful to be contained. Golden Queen had to separate him from the others...

Name: B l-2
Title: Anti-Virus
Explain: To slow down the contamination of Punishing Virus in the power system, Kamui needed to run the anti-virus program first...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: B l-3
Title: Exit
Explain: After successfully contaminating the power system, Roland left the Golden Vortex with his damaged Construct...

Name: M-13
Title: Golden Pinnacle
Explain: The evening had arrived. Gray Raven faced Golden Queen's final resort...<color=#0e70bd>\nTeam BP Limit: 6000             Required units: 1</color>

Name: M-14
Title: Collapse
Explain: Unable to stop her loss, Golden Queen was striped from the Construct. Golden Vortex collapsed, so did her "dynasty"...

Name: M-15
Title: Source of Disaster
Explain: Before sunset, Punishing Virus converted countless defeated guards into Corrupted. They were "reborn" from the Golden Vortex's ruins...
